original_text: But the king took Armoni and Mephibosheth, the two sons of Aiah’s daughter Rizpah, whom she had borne to Saul, together with the five sons of Saul’s daughter Merab, whom she had borne to Adriel son of Barzillai the Meholathite.
korean_text: 왕이 이에 아야의 딸 리스바에게서 난 자 곧 사울의 두 아들 알모니와 므비보셋과 사울의 딸 메랍에게서 난 자 곧 므홀랏 사람 바르실래의 아들 아드리엘의 다섯 아들을 붙잡아

sentences.original_text: But the king took Armoni and Mephibosheth
the two sons of Aiah's daughter Rizpah
whom she had borne to Saul
together with the five sons of Saul's daughter Merab
sentences.korean_translation: 사울의 딸 메랍의 다섯 아들들과 함께

sentences.original_text: whom she had borne to Adriel
